structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text:
Nothing in KRS 61.900 to 61.930 shall be construed as being in derogation of the common law, or of any statute of the Commonwealth, pertaining to:
Arrest by a private citizen; or
In any civil or criminal case, the defenses of protection of self, protection of another, protection of property, prevention of a suicide or crime and any other applicable justification defense set forth in KRS Chapter 503.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 13, effective January 1, 1977.
